briefTitle: A Communication Skills Package to Prevent Fear of Cancer Recurrence
officialTitle: Development and Feasibility of a Communication Training Package for Therapeutic Radiographers to Manage Emotional Talk With Breast Cancer Patients in Treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patients who are diagnosed with breast cancer, age 18+

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under 18 years old
* Male
* Known psychiatric illness
* Receiving palliative radiotherapy (non-curative)
* Unable to communicate in English
